title: [UX] Preserve pre-ion scrollback while reflowing chat on resize

logs.msg: Implemented viewport-only reflow on resize while preserving scrollback; scrollback content itself cannot be reflowed
Resize now clears scrollback when chat exists to reflow; pre-ion history still not preserved after resize
Resize reflow still clears scrollback when chat exists (needed for width reflow); preservation strategy still unresolved.
